hero.title: Real-World Impact at Scale
hero.subtitle: I solve complex problems. Here's a detailed look at my contributions to enterprise platforms.

caseStudies.problem: Onboarding new third-party loyalty program partners was a slow, manual engineering process that took weeks, delaying revenue and straining resources.
caseStudies.solution: I architected and built a new GPT-4-powered integration tool. This system automated the validation of partner APIs and generated the necessary integration code, creating a self-service partner experience.
caseStudies.description: Built GPT-4-powered tooling that automated API validation, cutting partner onboarding time from weeks to days while maintaining 99.9% uptime.

caseStudies.problem: The primary revenue-driving ad campaign workflow was built on legacy code, causing user friction and high support ticket volume. Multiple services were also stuck on an aging version of Ruby.
caseStudies.solution: I took ownership of the backend campaign workflows, redesigning the flows and enhancing the RESTful APIs to boost usability. I also led the complex upgrade from Ruby 2.7 to 3 across multiple services and created comprehensive runbooks.
caseStudies.description: Redesigned core revenue-driving campaign workflows, boosting user adoption and reducing support tickets while maintaining 99.95% uptime.

caseStudies.problem: A medical billing SaaS platform needed to migrate its entire user base to an enterprise-grade Okta SSO solution. The migration involved over 15,000 users and had to be seamless and HIPAA/PHIPA compliant.
caseStudies.solution: I architected and implemented the entire Okta SSO integration from end to end. This involved a secure, phased migration strategy, high test coverage, and building new Datadog dashboards to monitor the rollout in real-time.
caseStudies.description: Securely migrated 15,000+ healthcare professionals to Okta SSO with zero downtime and HIPAA/PHIPA compliance.

caseStudies.problem: A new Web 3.0 financial platform needed to build scalable REST APIs for secure crypto transactions and develop new features to drive user growth.
caseStudies.solution: I designed and implemented the core REST APIs. I also built a new referral system using React and Rails and separately optimized their job processing by upgrading Sidekiq from v5 to v7.
caseStudies.description: Built scalable REST APIs for crypto transactions and referral system that increased user acquisition by 25%.
